SEARCH
Package ProgettoLaboratorioB.Client

Class ClientService

java.lang.Object
ProgettoLaboratorioB.Client.ClientService
public class ClientService extends Object
This class is the client service that allows the client to communicate with the server, and to request the server to perform operations on the database.
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Enrico Artese

  • Method Details

    • StartClientApplication

      public static boolean StartClientApplication() throws RemoteException
      This function allows the client to start the client-application.
      Returns:
      true if the application is started, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the connection with the server fails.

    • CheckConnection

      public static boolean CheckConnection()
      This function allows the client if the server is online.
      Returns:
      true if the server is online, false otherwise.

    • SetUserConnected

      public void SetUserConnected(User user_con)

    • GetUserConnected

      public User GetUserConnected()

    • RegisterNewUser

      public boolean RegisterNewUser(User user)
      This function allows the user to register in the application. and go online on the server as user registered in the application database.
      Parameters:
      user - the new user that wants to register in the application.
      Returns:
      true if the registration is successful, false otherwise.

    • Login

      public User Login(String username, String password) throws SQLException
      This function allows the user to login in the application. And go online on the server as user registered in the application database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user that wants to log in.
      password - the password of the user that wants to log in.
      Returns:
      true if the login is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the query to the database fails.

    • Logout

      public void Logout()
      This function allows the user to logout from the application. and go offline from the server as users.

    • ShowUserProfile

      public void ShowUserProfile()
      This method returns the user that is logged in the application

    • SearchSongByTitle

      public static List<Song> SearchSongByTitle(String title) throws SQLException
      This method request to the server to search a song by title
      Parameters:
      title - a string that the user types in the search bar.
      Returns:
      a list of songs where the title compare with the string passed as parameter.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the query to the database fails.

    • SearchSongByYearTitle

      public static List<Song> SearchSongByYearTitle(String year, String title) throws SQLException
      This method request to the server to search a song by year and title
      Parameters:
      year - when the song was released
      title - the title of the song
      Returns:
      a list of songs that match the search
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • CreateNewPlaylist

      public static boolean CreateNewPlaylist(String ply_name, String plt_id)
      This method request to the server to create a new playlist
      Parameters:
      ply_name - the name of the playlist to create
      plt_id - the id of the playlist
      Returns:
      true if the playlist is created, false otherwise

    • GetUserPlaylists

      public static List<Playlist> GetUserPlaylists()
      This method request to the server to get all the playlists of the user
      Returns:
      a list of playlists by the username of the user connected.

    • GetPlaylistSongs

      public static List<Song> GetPlaylistSongs(String playlist_id)
      This method request to the server to get all the songs from a playlist
      Parameters:
      playlist_id - the id of the playlist
      Returns:
      a list of songs

    • AddSongToPlaylist

      public static boolean AddSongToPlaylist(String playlist_id, String song_id)
      This method request to the server to add a song to a playlist
      Parameters:
      playlist_id - the id of the playlist where the song will be added
      song_id - the id of the song to add
      Returns:
      true if the song has been added, false otherwise

    • RemoveSongFromPlaylist

      public static boolean RemoveSongFromPlaylist(String playlist_id, String song_id)
      This method request to the server to remove a song from a playlist
      Parameters:
      playlist_id - the id of the playlist where the song is
      song_id - the id of the song to remove
      Returns:
      true if the song has been removed, false otherwise

    • DeletePlaylist

      public static boolean DeletePlaylist(String playlist_id)
      This method request to the server to delete a playlist
      Parameters:
      playlist_id - the id of the playlist to delete
      Returns:
      true if the playlist has been deleted, false otherwise

    • RegisterNewEmotion

      public static boolean RegisterNewEmotion(Emotions emotions) throws RemoteException
      This method request to the server to register a new emotion
      Returns:
      true if the emotion has been registered, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • GetEmotionsFromSong

      public static List<Emotions> GetEmotionsFromSong(String songID) throws RemoteException
      This method request to the server to get all the emotions of a song
      Parameters:
      songID - the id of the song
      Returns:
      a list of emotions this function is accessible either by the user and by the anonymous client that is not registered in the application.
      Throws:
      RemoteException
